title: Fragment, 19th century
medium: plain compound twill and silk and gold on paper strips
description: large-scale dragons and flying clouds in extra wefts of green, pink, rust, blue, yellow and white silk and gold metal thread on navy blue twill ground - one selvage - for other components of objects originally accession numbered 1942-86-20-a/d, see also: 1942-86-20-a,b[still accessioned] and 1942-86-20-d [deaccessioned].

tombstone.epitaph: Fragment, 19th century. plain compound twill and silk and gold on paper strips. 1942-86-20-c.
